summary: Adds BBP to armor in Druid Essentials mod.
descriptionHtml:
Version: 1.0
Requirements: Skyrim , [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37665/?]Druid Essentials [/url]by ZeroEternalz Arcane51388 and Maymay1588
Author: I.Z. aka IDzeroNo
[img]http://i.imgur.com/P3Yfx1G.gif[/img]
==========
Description
==========
Adds BBP to armor in Druid Essentials mod.
==========
Install
==========

drop in data folder
==========
Change Log
==========
1.0 - Initial release.

==========
